descriptions.1: Policies about the use of public space in New York City affect the physical and mental health of New Yorkers. Select a health indicator to see data on asthma, noise pollution, traffic fatalities, traffic injuries, and air pollution.
descriptions.2: Policies about the use of public space in New York City affect the resilience and sustainability of the physical environment. Select an environmental indicator to see data on surface temperatures, park access, permeable surfaces, and tree canopies.
descriptions.3: Policies about the use of public space in New York City affect mobility and access to the built environment. Select a mobility indicator to see data on bike parking, bus lanes, bus speeds, protected bike lanes, traffic volumes, and public seating.
